title: Mass Effect – v1.02 + 2 DLCs + Bonus Content
body:
Mass Effect – v1.02 + 2 DLCs + Bonus Content


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, RPG, Third-person, 3D
Companies: BioWare / Electronic Arts
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 41.1 GB
Repack Size: from 3.1 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTi6
  • RuTor [magnet] EN/RU only
  • FreeTorrents EN/RU only
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] EN/RU only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2] MULTi6

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on three separate releases: Steam English (10.5 GB), Russian text-only (10.5 GB) and Russian Gold (12.1 GB) editions
  • Missing French, German and Italian language packs added (7.8 GB)
  • Bonus content (OST, Art Book, Prima Official Guide – 241 MB) added, as an optional download
  • Use files in “_Optional Autoloader” folder in case installer’s inability to write proper registry settings for you
  • Note 1: Russian Gold edition officially doesn’t have Pinnacle Station DLC
  • Note 2: Russian text-only edition has Pinnacle Station DLC in English by default; ZOG fan translation v0.9 can be copied over original files after installation, if you need it
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus and language files you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 41.1 GB to 3.1~4.7 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 7-25 minutes (depending on your system and selected language; Russian Gold takes more time, than other options)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 14 GB (~21 GB during installation)
  • Repack by FitGirl
  • Thanks to rui_brochado for helping me with this mess of the game 😉

Game Description

As Commander Shepard, you lead an elite squad on a heroic, action-packed adventure throughout the galaxy.

Game Features

  • Discover the imminent danger from an ancient threat and battle the traitorous Saren and his deadly army to save civilization. The fate of all life depends on your actions!
  • 2007 New York Times Game of the Year
  • A Stunning universe with high resolution graphics and textures
  • Controls and interface optimized for PC gamers
  • Includes free additional content – face off against the horrific Batarians
  • Customize your character and embark on a pulse-pounding adventure in an immersive open-ended storyline
  • Incredible real-time character interaction
  • Thrilling, tactical combat as you lead an elite squad of three
  • Interplanetary exploration of an epic proportion

Without optional files you can install the game either in English or Spanish (with English dub) translation.

You can skip downloading of files you don’t need. Here is the list of such files:

  • setup-fitgirl-optional-bonus-content.bin (OST, Art Book, Prima Official Guide)
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-italian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-russian-complete.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-russian-text-only.bin
